patch.description:
Enables a developer debug mode. This does the following:
- New games start on dlvl 1 instead of in Tristram - All monsters are Corpse Axes (except for setlevels like Skeleton King Lair and Bone Chamber, or the Butcher) - Dungeon seeds are fixed to dlvl (dlvl 1 is seed 1, etc) - Cheats: On/Off replaces Music: On/Off in the game menu. Hold CTRL+SHIFT when clicking to toggle. - Bunch of developer related keyboard functions - All normal quests are active (Butcher, Skeleton King, Magic Rock, Bone Chamber)
This unlocks additional inputs:
- F4: Show FPS on control panel - E: Show eflag on control panle - P: Will pause the game, but pressing again will frame advance. No way to unpause
When cheats are on:
- Everything in the cheat patch - You have access to all spells, each is level 0 - All quests are in the quest log, even The Maze (level 4 stairs blocker that requires reading the Tome)
